name: The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings Enhanced Edition
notes: This version offers way better performance than the official Linux ports for GOG and Steam.
content:
game:
  appid: 20920
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    app: d3dx9_36
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx9_39
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet40
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: '1'
winesteam:
  esync: 'true'
